bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wooksong>@wooksong</denchmark-link>
dldt (openVINO)'s Tizen spec file has patch files that are not committed. It appears that you didn't add two files in /packaging/ directory and GBS-tested locally with --include-all options. Please add the two files in review.tizen.org's /platform/upstream/dldt (via Gerrit). GBS Log: <denchmark-code>[ 46s] ----------------------------------------------------------------- [ 46s] ----- building openvino.spec (user abuild) [ 46s] ----------------------------------------------------------------- [ 46s] ----------------------------------------------------------------- [ 46s] + exec rpmbuild --define '_srcdefattr (-,root,root)' --nosignature --target=x86_64 --define '_build_create_debug 1' -ba /home/abuild/rpmbuild/SOURCES/openvino.spec [ 46s] error: Bad source: /home/abuild/rpmbuild/SOURCES/0001-CMake-Do-not-call-get_linux_name-when-LINUX_OS_NAME-.patch: No such file or directory [ 46s] Building target platforms: x86_64 [ 46s] Building for target x86_64 [ 46s] [ 46s] kohaku failed "build openvino.spec" at Tue Dec 10 00:36:23 UTC 2019. [ 46s] ... mzx@kohaku:/source/tizen/dldt$ ls packaging/ -l total 13248 -rw-rw-r-- 1 mzx mzx 116082 Dec 9 09:12 ade-cbe2db61a659c2cc304c3837406f95c39dfa938e.tar.gz -rw-rw-r-- 1 mzx mzx 13406708 Dec 9 09:12 ngraph-0.22.0-rc.2.tar.gz -rw-rw-r-- 1 mzx mzx 67 Dec 9 09:12 openvino.manifest -rw-rw-r-- 1 mzx mzx 5771 Dec 9 09:12 openvino.spec </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1931>#1931</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
